ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item

Interface IGraphItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEditItemObservable, IRestrictedGraphItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEdge, IVertex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGraphItem, GravisEdge, GravisVertex

    public interface IGraphItem
extends IRestrictedGraphItem, IEditItemObservable
    This interface gives access to common methods on vertices and edges.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentColor

        Color getCurrentColor()
        Returns the current color of this graph item if this item is visible. This method return GravisColor.WHITE if this item is not visible.
        Returns:
        current color or white

      • isCurrentDashed

        boolean isCurrentDashed()
        Returns:
        current dashed value

      • isCurrentTagged

        boolean isCurrentTagged()
        Returns:
        current tagged value

      • isCurrentVisible

        boolean isCurrentVisible()
        Returns:
        current visible value

      • resetNewVariables

        void resetNewVariables()
        Resets the item new variables to the initial values. This method calls : this.setNewComment(""); this.setStateCommentEnabled(false); this.setNewState(null); this.setNewResult(Double.NaN); this.setNewVisible(null); this.setNewTagged(null); this.setNewDashed(null);

      • setCurrentColor

        void setCurrentColor(Color currentColor)
        Parameters:
        currentColor -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if currentColor is null

      • setCurrentDashed

        Parameters:
        value -

      • setCurrentResult

        void setCurrentResult(double result)
        Sets the current calculation result.
        Parameters:
        result -

      • setCurrentState

        void setCurrentState(ItemState currentState)
        Parameters:
        currentState -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if currentState is null

        Parameters:
        tagged -

      • setCurrentVisible

        void setCurrentVisible(boolean visible)
        Parameters:
        visible -

      • setName

        void setName(String name)
        Sets the unique name of this graph item. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.EDITED is fired if name is different from the existing value.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null
